unlock_global: Unlock global possibilities. Select your language, for a seamless money transfer experience.
onboarding1_desc: Tap to notify the school when you're nearby. Teachers guide your child to the gate — no calls, no waiting.
onboarding2_title: Smart Canteen Control at Your Fingertips
onboarding2_desc: Set spending limits, pre-select meals, and avoid allergy risks — all from your phone. Top-up with Apple Pay or VISA.
onboarding3_desc: See the school bus or delegated driver on the map, know exactly when your child is on the move — just like delivery apps.
notification_request: "Auto Nida" Would like to send you Notifications
notification_desc: Notifications may include alerts, sounds, and icon badges. These can be configured in Settings
location_request: Allow "Auto Nida" to use your location
location_desc: Auto Nida uses your location to deliver essential features and improve your app experience.
role_desc: Choose the role that matches your responsibility at school.
register_desc: For the best experience, simply register or login with your mobile number.
terms_agree: By continuing Sign up you agree to following Terms & Conditions and Policy.
verification_code_sent: We have sent the 4 digit activation code on your phone number through WhatsApp or SMS
